name: JUST A SLIME
description:
Extract the game from the zip file and run the JUST A SLIME.exe

# JUST A SLIME

The concept is from the anime called "That time i got Reincarnated as a Slime".
Basically you live as a slime as a low level creature but they didnt know that you got Sage mode
where in you can litterally eat away creatures and obtain their abilities.

This game is Fast Paced like a Geometry Dash and the reason for you to keep playing is to beat your High Score
indicated with how much time it took you to finish the Game

Note!!!
This is like a Geometry Dash and as you pressumed it is just as hard, or even harder.

# Controll
you can use any control below that suits you the best
W, A, S, D, [SPACE BAR], UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT

# Why this game is worth playing?
Thou i only have 2 days to make and polish things i really put things that are best for 2d platformer including:
Cayote time Buffer - This is a buffer that allows the player to still activate its jump even if it falls off a bit in a clif
Afraid of Heights - Enemy who walks on the ground shoud not jump of the clif and would always get flipped
Simplistic Ai - The ai was pretty simplistic that you can predict where the next attack might be
